title: To riot HQ, who I bet don't check forum content from the oce server:
body:
I request that you sync local chat with server via time stamps for the sake of the normals-lane-calling status-quo. Surely it's a simple fix that I guarantee will indirectly decrease toxicity.

Simple fix for a problem with major consequences. How do you expect a team to communicate efficiently if the status-quo relies on a faulty system? It's ludicrous. Poor coding.

SIMPLE. FIX. F@#%.

replies.body: why don't you just post it on NA boards?

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:42:55.133+0000)
>
> why don't you just post it on NA boards?

Hhahaha yes indeed

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:47:01.566+0000)
>
> Hhahaha yes indeed

We have access?

The way I do it is change "oce" on the URL to "na".
I actually don't know if there is a button that you could press or whatever to change, because whenever I try to change server (top left corner of the page) it doesn't work.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:57:42.170+0000)
>
> The way I do it is change "oce" on the URL to "na".
> I actually don't know if there is a button that you could press or whatever to change, because whenever I try to change server (top left corner of the page) it doesn't work.

On the top left there is the region link, like say, North America (English), click it, then click "Oceania",

And it should pop up with a

> Oceania
English - where this one is a link.

Click "English" and you're done, assuming you have already logged on from OCE, otherwise only log on after you have the correct the region selected otherwise it will just tell you that your password isn't correct or something like that.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:57:42.170+0000)

> The way I do it is change "oce" on the URL to "na".
> I actually don't know if there is a button that you could press or whatever to change, because whenever I try to change server (top left corner of the page) it doesn't work.

Already did it.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:42:55.133+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=ArcticHorizon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZnoEhfRG,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-17T05:59:29.384+0000)
>
> Did!

posting it here is not giving it more of a publicity, just opens it to hate which is assuming exactly what u want
I don't think it should be that way and I don't think it is that way.

...Am i the only one that thinks that if you argue in champ select, nothing is gonna make it better anyways?
I mean, if you want to instalock a role, you might as well play InstalockBuilder rather than normal.
